ai-iti70:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti70:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I’ve seen beings who engaged in bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, who abused the noble ones, who had wrong views and acted accordingly.
ai-iti70:2.2_0: They spoke ill of the noble ones; they had wrong view; and they chose to act out of that wrong view.
ai-iti70:3.1_0: Now, I don’t say this because I’ve heard it from some other ascetic or brahmin.
ai-iti70:3.2_0: I’ve seen beings who engaged in bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, who abused the noble ones, who had wrong views and acted accordingly.
ai-iti70:3.3_0: They spoke ill of the noble ones; they had wrong view; and they chose to act out of that wrong view.
ai-iti70:3.4_0: I only say it because I’ve known, seen, and realized it for myself.”
ai-iti70:4.1_0: I’ve seen beings who engaged in bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, who abused the noble ones, who had wrong views and acted accordingly.
ai-iti70:4.2_0: They spoke ill of the noble ones; they had wrong view; and they chose to act out of that wrong view.”
ai-iti70:4.3_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti70:5.3_0: and right bodily deeds have been done,
ai-iti70:6.2_0: though their life may be short,
ai-iti70:6.3_0: when their body breaks up, that witless person
ai-iti70:7.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
